content: --अर्थः {1} the highest or most sublime truth, true spiritual knowledge, knowledge about Brahman or the Supreme spirit; <ls>R. 8. 22</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 2.</ls> {2} truth, reality, earnestness; परिहासविजल्पितं सखे परमार्थेन न गृह्यतां वचः <ls>Ś. 2. 18</ls>; oft in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘true’ or ‘real’; °मत्स्याः <ls>R. 7. 40.</ls> <ls>Mv. 4. 30.</ls> {3} any excellent or important object. {4} the best sense. {5} the best kind of wealth.
